transArray.content: The room facilities, services, sanitation and food are all OK, but the sound insulation of the goose is really terrible. The sound of things falling upstairs, the sound of people playing cards next door, the elevator, and people coming and going in the corridor have 270-degree surround sound, which can't be blocked by wearing earplugs. Falling asleep at 2:30 and waking up at 7, lui.
